original_text: Because God has been kind to me, I must tell his message to all people. I must tell his good news to people who have learned many things, and to those who have never been to school. I must tell it to people who are wise as well as to those who are not very clever.
korean_text: 헬라인이나 야만인이나 지혜 있는 자나 어리석은 자에게 다 내가 빚진 자라

sentences.original_text: Because God has been kind to me
I must tell his message to all people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 모든 사람에게 그의 메시지를 전해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: I must tell his good news to people who have learned many things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 많은 것을 배운 사람들에게 그의 복음을 전해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and to those who have never been to school
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 학교에 다녀본 적 없는 사람들에게도

sentences.original_text: I must tell it to people who are wise
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 지혜로운 사람들에게 그것을 전해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: as well as to those who are not very clever
